summary:
Singapore Airlines (SIA) is a top-rated airline based in Singapore, known for its excellent service and unique branding featuring the "Singapore Girl." It operates from Changi Airport and is part of the Star Alliance. SIA has won many awards, including being named the world's best airline five times by Skytrax.

The airline uses various modern aircraft, like the Airbus A350 and A380, and has many subsidiaries, including SIA Engineering for maintenance and Scoot, a low-cost carrier. SIA is also known for being the first to use the largest passenger aircraft, the Airbus A380.
title: Singapore Airlines
